description:
Originally established in 1997, the Lanier Law Group P.A. in Raleigh, North Carolina, has more than 23 years of experience assisting individuals and families across our state who are suffering needlessly as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Regarded as one of North Carolina's premier injury law firms, we have secured millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, defective products, unsafe property conditions, sexual assault, workplace accidents and more. We also help clients who need to obtain their rightful workers' compensation benefits as well as those who have had their Social Security Disability claims denied.

Along with the millions of dollars we have recovered, our attorneys have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers for their outstanding professionalism and legal abilities. We have received designation as being among the Top 100 Trial Lawyers in the country along with many other accolades, and we have also received numerous positive testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To increase your chances of success, you need to put a heavyweight in your corner who will fight tirelessly to help you obtain the justice you deserve. To begin the process, you can contact the Lanier Law Group P.A. to schedule a free case evaluation. Additionally, our law firm offers virtual consultations to help keep you and your family safe in today's uncertain environment.
